SETTINGS.TITLE: Paramètres
SETTINGS.BUG_REPORT:
Thank you for filing a bug! Please read the following message and replace the text surrounded by brackets ([[]]) with your report.
Where did the bug occur?
		[[ ENTER TEXT HERE ]]
What task were you trying to accomplish?
		[[ ENTER TEXT HERE ]]
What result did you expect?
		[[ ENTER TEXT HERE ]]
Any other relevant information or comments?
		[[ ENTER TEXT HERE ]]
May we contact you for more information?
		[x] YES [ ] NO
SETTINGS.POS_RECEIPT_INFO: Si cette option est activé, l'impression sera fait avec l'imprimante thermique.
SETTINGS.SIMPLIFIED_CARD_INFO: Les identifiants simples de patients ont une largeur de 75mm, la hauteur de 125mm est en orientation 'Paysage'. Les identités standard sont 'A6'.
